content: *these plushy amigurumi stacking toys make a great baby shower gift lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 90075ad corrections applied jan 26 2010 skill level easy vanna s choice® baby article #840 9 colors 1 ball each *ed note small amounts of each color are used * crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm split ring stitch markers fiberfill stuffing small amount of black yarn patterns all included in pdf base & frog post bee ring ladybug ring dragonfly ring some construction required to finish
